description: Uses Cerbo GX to monitor Victron MPPT solar, Multiplus inverter, DC usage, batteries, tanks, and Ruuvi temperture sensors

panels.description:
Victron Energy  
Smart Shunt 500A/50mV

options.content:
Battery
3 x 170Ah AGM parallel = 510Ah = 6120Wh at 12V

panels.description:
Current state of charge (SOC) of the leisure batteries, 
determined by the measuring resistor.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Soc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Soc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description:
Remaining runtime at current consumption,
calculated from the measuring resistor.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/TimeToGo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description:
Current voltage of the leisure batteries,
measured at the measuring resistor in volts.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description:
Current current flow of the leisure batteries,
measured at the measuring resistor in amperes.
(Positive values: charge, negative values: consumption)

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Current') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current power of the leisure batteries measured in watts (Positive values: charge, negative values: discharge)

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current temperature of the leisure batteries, measured by a temperature sensor via the inverter.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/0/Temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Battery voltage and current curve, measured by the measuring resistor in volts and amperes.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Current') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Voltage and Current

panels.description: Battery temperature history, measured by a temperature sensor in degrees Celsius.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/0/Temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: Battery power in Watts, positive is charge and negative discharge

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Power

panels.description:
Victron Energy  
Smart Solar Charger MPPT 100/30

options.content:
Solar
2 x 200W, 1 x 130W in serial = 530W

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Yield/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Solar module power curve, measured by the solar charge controller in watts.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Yield/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'State') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") *2.5 FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'MppOperationMode') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Power Curve

panels.description: Current voltage of the solar modules, measured by the solar charge controller in volts.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Pv/V') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current current flow of the solar modules, measured by the solar charge controller in amperes.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Yield/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Pv/V') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current status of the solar charge controller.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'State') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Voltage and current curve of the solar modules, measured by the solar charge controller in volts and amperes.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Pv/V') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'State') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Yield/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Solarpanel

panels.description: Battery voltage and current curves, measured by the solar charge controller in volts and amperes.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/0/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/0/Current') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'State') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Battery

panels.description: From other dashboards

options.content:
DC power
Usage

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/System/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Battery DC load curve, measured by the measuring resistor in watts.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/System/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'solarcharger' AND "topic"::tag = 'Pv/V') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/System/Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description:
Victron Energy  
MultiPlus Compact 12/2000/80-30

options.content:
Inverter
Output and Input

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/Out/L1/P') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vebus/Ac/Out/L1/P" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vebus/Ac/Out/L1/P" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Current energy source of the inverter.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/ActiveIn/S') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current current flow of the inverter.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/Out/L1/I') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/Out/L1/V') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/Out/L1/I') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'vebus' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/ActiveIn/L1/P') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vebus/Ac/ActiveIn/P" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "vebus/Ac/ActiveIn/Connected" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Current input voltage of the inverter, measured in volts.

Current input current flow of the inverter
measured in amperes.
Current input current limit of the inverter, measured in amperes.
From other dashboard

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Ac/In/0/Source') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: AC PV Power by Installation

panels.description: Voltage tank meters using Victron GX tank 140

options.content:
Tanks
200L diesel, 700L water

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'tank' AND "topic"::tag = 'Level' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '25') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Soc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'tank' AND "topic"::tag = 'Level' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '24') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Soc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'system' AND "topic"::tag = 'Dc/Battery/Voltage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Ruuvi sensors blue toothed to MultiPlus

options.content:
Temperature and Humidity
Ruuvi Bluetooth-Sensor

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Temperature' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '20') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Temperature, humidity, and voltage trends measured by the Bluetooth sensor in C, %H, and volts.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Temperature' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '20') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'BatteryVoltage' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '20') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Humidity' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '20') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Temperature' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '21') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Temperature, humidity, and voltage trends measured by the Bluetooth sensor in C, %H, and volts.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Temperature' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '21') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'BatteryVoltage' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '21') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "N" WHERE ("path"::tag = 'temperature' AND "topic"::tag = 'Humidity' AND "VRMinstance"::tag = '21') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
